title: I cant login
body: Today, i tried to log in to my league account to play some games. It said that my username/password combo was incorrect. I tried multiple times but i still doesn't work. I can't forgot the password to my email so i cant change the password of my league account . I am sure i haven't forgotten my league password, as i am a frequent player. When i tried to log into forums with the account, it didn't work. I made a new account to post this thread. Pls help!!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
Quite honestly, it sounds like your account might have been compromised.  Someone could have accessed it, and then changed your password so you would be locked out.  In this situation, make sure to [send us over a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  We can immediately look into this for you and hopefully recover your account back to you.

Give me a heads up if you have any other questions!
